response.explain: The execution error indicates that the shrimp cannot be cooked because it is not heatable and it is frozen. Therefore, we need to defrost the shrimp before cooking it.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Defrost the prawn
(7) Cook the prawn on the stove
(8) Turn off the stove
(9) Register the prawn and the plate
(10) Cook the prawn
(11) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(12) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Defrost the prawn
    heat(robot, shrimp_201)
    donothing(env)
